attributes.action: To allow constituents to bring a 'Vote of NO Confidence' regarding their MP
attributes.additional_details: It is time that MPs listen to their constituency and implement their constituencies wishes. That MPs act for and on-behalf of their constituency and not party lines.
attributes.background: We ask Parliament to pass a law that will allow constituents to bring a 'Vote of NO Confidence' against their MP when it can be categorically shown that the stated MP has not, OR will not implement the wishes of his or her constituency.
